text: Yelahanka railway station hathira mane olage neeru barthide, please help!
Massive landslide on Madikeri-Mangalore road near Jodupla. Two cars buried.
Raichur jilleyalli 3 days inda kudiyuva neerilla. Crops are dying.
Building collapse in Shivamogga market area after heavy rains. People trapped inside.
Udupi beach side high tide neeru shops olage barthide. Fishermen are stuck.
Pregnant woman in Kalaburagi village needs urgent transport, but no ambulance available.
Heavy fire at Belagavi industrial area. Multiple workers have burn injuries.
Krishna river water level crossing danger mark near Almatti. Villages need evacuation.
Uttara Kannada forest fire near Dandeli spreading fast toward residential zones.
Open borewell accident in Ballari. A small child has fallen inside.
